snippet: Joe McNally loves to photograph hard-to-reach urban areas, and has gone to the top of the antennas on the World Trade Center and the Empire State Building. Recently, he went even higher and made a popular Instagram photo while there.
abstract: Joe McNally loves to photograph hard-to-reach urban areas, and has gone to the top of the antennas on the World Trade Center and the Empire State Building. Recently, he went even higher and made a popular Instagram photo while there.

headline.main: Photographing on Top of the World
